Second Congressional District voters voted for an outsider and will do so again in 2020. - Team Watkins  #ksleg #ks02 #WinningIsWhatWatkinsDoes

Kansans are sick and tired of these attempted political swamp chess moves. Steve Watkins has fought for this country fought for the sanctity of life and fought for our second amendment rights - you better believe he will continue to fight for the people of Kansas.

Steve Watkins went against the DCCC's best candidate in over a decade and over $5million in outside spending and won in 2018. Winning is what Watkins does. It is no surprise insiders are once again trying to force out an outsider.

I enjoyed speaking with Crawford County Republican Women Chair and and Vice Chair of the Crawford County GOP Christi McNally as well as Michael Barrett of @AFPFKansas. I’m looking forward to working with these key leaders headed into 2020. #SeeYouInNov #KS02 #ksleg” https://t.co/SZriyhM04n
